steps.name: activateBeastMode
steps.summary: Activate Beast Mode.

steps.name: getTheSummoningKey
steps.summary: Get The Summoning Key.

steps.name: theMagicianItem
steps.summary: Obtain the Lawyer's Pen by using Beast Mode to electrify the meter and drop the crate on Easy Street.

steps.name: theMagician
steps.summary: Complete the Magician's ritual in his apartment above Easy Street.

steps.name: theBoxerItem
steps.summary: Obtain the Championship Belt by using Beast Mode to knock down the crate in the Waterfront District.

steps.name: theBoxer
steps.summary: Complete the Boxer's ritual in the Waterfront District.

steps.name: theDetectiveItem
steps.summary: Obtain the Detective's Badge by using Beast Mode to access the crate behind the locked grate in the Canals District.

steps.name: theDetective
steps.summary: Complete the Detective's ritual in the Ruby Rabbit.

steps.name: theFemmeFataleItem
steps.summary: Obtain the Producer's Toupee by using Beast Mode to cross the gap and drop the crate in the Footlight District.

steps.name: theFemmeFatale
steps.summary: Complete the Femme Fatale's ritual in the Black Lace Burlesque.

steps.name: collectGateworms
steps.summary: Collect the Gateworms from each completed ritual site.

steps.name: ascendingTheApocalypse
steps.summary: Place the Gateworms in the Sacred Place to access the Pack-a-Punch.

steps.name: unlockTheSacredPlace
steps.summary: Unlock the sacred place by opening a rift.

steps.name: rideTheTram
steps.summary: Ride the Tram to spot the three symbols through the windows, necessary for the Apothicon Sword.

steps.name: obtainingTheApothiconEggs
steps.summary: Use the spotted symbols to open a wall and get an Apothicon Egg in the Sacred Place.

steps.name: chargeApothiconEggs
steps.summary: Place and charge the Apothicon Eggs at each the four statue by killing zombies.

steps.name: getTheApothiconSwords
steps.summary: Get Apothicon Sword by returning the charged egg to the statue at The Crazy Place.

steps.name: upgradingTheApothiconSwords
steps.summary: Use the Eggs to complete rituals around the map, upgrading the Apothicon Swords.

steps.name: captureTheFlag
steps.summary: Interact with the book in Nero's ritual area, then defend the flag at specific locations.

steps.name: capturingTheShadowman
steps.summary: Use the Keeper protectors to remove the Shadowman's shield, then capture him in the Summoning Key.

steps.name: avertingTheApocalypse
steps.summary: Kill Margwas to reactivate Beast Mode pedestals, then use them to disrupt the giant Apothicon's attack.
